means: 偏执的，顽固的，心胸狭窄的

sentence.Network_cn: 他非常偏执，而且具有种族歧视思想。

sentence.Network_en: The family has been described variously as crass, bigoted, racist and plain boring.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们对这家人有各种不同的评价：愚蠢、顽固、有种族偏见和无聊透顶，不一而足。

sentence.Network_en: He is so bigoted that it is impossible to argue with him.

list.abs: Even outside ex - Yugoslavia , authoritarian and bigoted ideas still haunt the political fringe ., 即使在前南地区以外 , 极权主义与偏执观念仍萦绕在政治生活的边缘.
a bigoted person ; an outrageously bigoted viewpoint .一个偏执的人；一个异常偏执的观点
objective : to observe effect of treating bigoted facial paralysis plum-blossom needle and embedding catgut .目的：观察梅花针配合埋线治疗顽固性面瘫的临床疗效。
I ' m afraid , i am still so bigoted and stubborn ., 我害怕 , 我依旧那么偏执 , 固执.

entry.tran: 固执的；执拗的；顽固不化的
entry.def: Someone who is bigoted has strong, unreasonable prejudices or opinions and will not change them, even when they are proved to be wrong.

example.tran: 他非常偏执，而且具有种族歧视思想。

means.word_mean: 1. blindly and obstinately attached to some creed or opinion and intolerant toward others;

auth_sentence.content: His hounding of bigoted black leaders has been magnificent.

auth_sentence.content: She disliked the old man's bigoted hatred of all minorities.
